Please keep me notified. We will be in Europe then.

JIHONG

Sent from my iPad

messages.subject: Edinburgh, London, Baud
messages.msgSnippet: Details are not all completely there yet, but I ll be in Edinburgh in late May, London on June 11, and in Brittany, in western France June 14-17 (where other
messages.messageBody:
Details are not all completely there yet, but I'll be in Edinburgh in late May, London on June 11, and in Brittany, in western France June 14-17 (where other unschoolers are welcome to come and visit and maybe camp).

Schuyler and David Waynforth will be there too, in London and in Brittany.

Anyone wanting to be on notification lists for any of these things should write to me on the side so I'll have your e-mail.

http://www.sandradoddvisit.ebhe.org.uk/

http://sandradodd.com/france

There isn't a site yet for the LiTTLe Conference in London, but Holly did the logo, and so I know the name is



The LiTTLe Conference in London

Learning Trust – Trusting Learning—a Conference for Autonomous Home Educators and Unschoolers

Sandra
